name: Transplant
description:
Escape the hospital while reading notes and documents to uncover what has happened to you.  Don't get caught.

Controls:

KeyboardActionA, D,
←, →MoveW, S, A, D 
↑, ↓, ←, →
ClimbSPACEJumpEInteract with object/ open door / close notesIOpen inventorySHIFTSprint (hold down)HGo into  and exit Hide mode (cannot be used when you are directly over the thing you wish to hide behind)
